courseDetails.title: Introduction to Domain Names and Web Hosting - Quick Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how Domain Names Work and Types of Web Hosting for any Web Development Project
courseDetails.longDescription:
Course: Introduction to Domain Names and Web Hosting - Quick GuideDomain Names Section:

Take a look at all the exciting concepts we will cover below:

We provide an overview of the domain name registration process. This includes the role of registrars and TLD (Top Level Domain) administration by ICANN. ccTLD's (Country Code Top Level Domains) are also explored.

Students will gain hands-on experience with the registration process using popular domain registrars. We will provide a comparison of different registrars and register a sample domain name using GoDaddy. Other topics of discussion will include: domain name privacy and administration, auto-renewal, domain forwarding, and name server assignment.


Web Hosting Section:

We conduct an in-depth case analysis of web hosting solutions including: Shared, Virtual Private, Dedicated and Cloud Hosting.

We provide an overview of various packages offered by different web hosting companies and weigh the pros and cons of each one.

Students are also introduced to the importance of web server scalability and the advantages of cloud hosting over traditional hosting services. We also examine the infrastructure requirements of popular, resource intensive applications such as Netflix and Facebook to emphasize the importance of avoiding costly mistakes in the initial stages of development.

What you'll learn

  • How Domain Names Work

  • How to Register a Domain Name

  • The Role of Domain Registrars

  • Types of Domains (TLD, CCTLD)

  • The Role of ICANN

  • How to conduct a Whois Search

  • How to Register a domain using GoDaddy

  • How to Administer a domain name using Godaddy

  • Setting up Domain Name Privacy, Auto-Renewal, Domain Forwarding

  • Domain Name Server Administration

  • Types of Web Hosting

  • Case Analysis - Shared, Virtual Private, Dedicated, Cloud Hosting

  • Assessing Scalability and Resource Requirements

courseDetails.title: Configure NGINX on a Cloud Server: Digital Ocean & AWS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Digital Ocean | NGINX | LEMP Stack | Domain Names | SSL | WordPress | AWS Foundations | Amazon EC2 | AWS Storage | ELB
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course provides students with a comprehensive overview of foundational concepts and practical skills required to deploy web applications using Apache and NGINX servers, configure and manage cloud servers on Digital Ocean and AWS platforms, and leverage various AWS storage solutions to support EC2 instances.

The course begins by introducing the foundational concepts of Apache and NGINX servers. Students learn about the architecture, configuration, and key features of both servers, while exploring how to deploy and configure them to host web applications. We also teach the key differences between Apache and NGINX and the best use cases for each web server technology.

Next, the course covers cloud server deployment on Digital Ocean. Students learn how to set up and configure a Digital Ocean account and create a new droplet. They will also explore various tools and technologies available on the Digital Ocean platform and learn how to leverage them to build and deploy web applications.

The course then delves into LEMP stack configuration on Ubuntu. Students will learn how to install and configure LEMP stack on Ubuntu, including setting up Nginx, MySQL, and PHP. We teach how to configure Nginx as a reverse proxy and leverage various Nginx modules to optimize web application performance.

Next, the course covers domain name registration and SSL encryption. Students will learn how to register a domain name, configure DNS settings, and secure web applications using SSL encryption. They will also explore various SSL certificate providers and understand how to choose the right certificate for their use case.

The course then moves on to WordPress installation and configuration on NGINX. Students will learn how to install and configure WordPress on a NGINX server, including setting up the necessary database and configuring Nginx as a reverse proxy. They will also explore various WordPress plugins and themes and understand how to customize them to meet specific requirements.

From here, we dive into AWS foundations. Students learn about the architecture, features, and key services available on the AWS platform, including EC2 and IAM. They will also understand how to set up and configure an AWS account and explore various AWS tools and technologies.

Next, the course covers Amazon EC2 foundations. Students learn to create and configure EC2 instances, including setting up security groups, configuring networking, and selecting the right instance type for specific use cases. They will also explore various EC2 features and understand how to leverage them to optimize instance performance.

The course then moves on to AWS storage solutions for EC2. Students will learn about various AWS storage solutions, including EBS, S3, and Glacier. They will understand how to configure and manage these storage solutions to support EC2 instances, and explore various use cases where different storage solutions may be appropriate.

Finally, the course covers AWS Elastic Load Balancing, Auto Scaling Groups, and Route 53. Students will learn how to set up and configure load balancers and auto scaling groups, and understand how to use Route 53 to manage DNS settings. They will also explore various use cases where load balancing, auto scaling, and Route 53 may be necessary to optimize application performance and availability.

Overall, this course provides students with a comprehensive overview of foundational concepts and practical skills required to deploy web applications using Apache and NGINX servers, configure and manage cloud servers on Digital Ocean and AWS platforms, and leverage various AWS storage solutions to support EC2 instances. Students will also gain practical experience through hands-on labs and exercises, and understand how to apply these concepts and skills to real-world use cases.
targetAudiences: Web developers who want to gain practical skills in deploying and managing web servers and web applications in the cloud.
IT professionals who want to expand their knowledge and skills in AWS and cloud computing, and to gain hands-on experience in deploying and managing web applications.
Entrepreneurs who want to launch web-based businesses and need to understand the basics of web server deployment, management, and optimization.
System administrators who want to gain practical experience in setting up and configuring web servers and applications on the cloud, using both Apache and NGINX servers.

Students and professionals who are interested in pursuing careers in cloud computing and web development, and want to gain foundational knowledge and practical skills in server deployment, management, and optimization.

Assessment Description:

Assessment in business administration, management, and leadership are crucial for both employees and companies. For employees, assessments provide a means to evaluate their strengths and weaknesses, identify areas for improvement, and develop skills necessary for career advancement. For companies, assessments help to identify talent within the organization, improve employee performance and productivity, and ensure that the company's workforce is aligned with its overall business strategy.


Assessments in business administration, management, and leadership cover a wide range of topics, including organizational behavior, financial management, marketing strategy, human resources management, and more.


One important benefit of assessments is that they provide employees with understanding about their areas of knowledge, which can help them identify areas for improvement and develop the skills they need to advance in their careers. Assessments can also help employees gain a better understanding of their strengths and weaknesses, which can help them make informed decisions about their career paths and identify areas where they may need to focus their professional development efforts.


For companies, assessments help to identify and develop talent within the organization, which is essential for ensuring that the company has the skills and expertise it needs to achieve its business goals. Assessments can also help companies identify areas where they may need to invest in employee training and development, and help to ensure that their workforce is aligned with the company's overall business strategy.


Assessment in business administration, management, and leadership are essential for both employees and companies. It helps employees identify areas for improvement and develop the skills they need to advance in their careers. For companies, assessments help to identify and develop talent within the organization and ensure that their workforce is aligned with their overall business strategy. In the digital age, digital assessments are becoming increasingly important for building a successful career in business administration, management, and leadership, as they help employees develop the skills they need to stay competitive in today's job market.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web desde cero con WordPress y ChatGPT, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CHATGPT PARA AUMENTAR LAS VENTAS DE TU NEGOCIO?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


ChatGPT es un sistema de chat basado en el modelo de lenguaje por Inteligencia Artificial GPT-3, desarrollado por la empresa OpenAI. Es un modelo con más de 175 millones de parámetros, y entrenado con grandes cantidades de texto para realizar tareas relacionadas con el lenguaje, desde la traducción hasta la generación de texto.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress,  también utilizaremos la plataforma de ChatGPT que nos brindará el apoyo y la información necesaria para diseñar nuestro sitio web en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress y ChatGPT desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu sitio web con la ayuda de ChatGPT.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo adaptar tu sitio web para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y ChatGPT de forma rápida y sencilla.

courseDetails.title: Mit OKR Ziele erreichen durch agiles Projektmanagement
courseDetails.shortDescription: Goal Setting mit der OKR Methode - lerne, deine persönlichen und Unternehmensziele zu erreichen wie ein Profi!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Die OKR-Methode (Objectives and Key Results) ist ein Zielmanagementsystem, das von Unternehmen wie Google, Intel, LinkedIn, Twitter und vielen anderen bekannt gemacht wurde. Das OKR-Konzept wurde in den letzten Jahren zunehmend in Unternehmen eingeführt und ist heute eines der wichtigsten Instrumente der Unternehmensführung.

Ziel dieses Kurses ist es, dir eine Einführung in das OKR-Konzept zu geben und Ihnen zu zeigen, wie OKRs zur Steigerung der Effizienz und Effektivität in deinem Unternehmen eingesetzt werden können.

In diesem Kurs wirst du verstehen, was OKRs  sind und wie sie für dein Unternehmen hilfreich sein können. Ich zeige dir einen strukturierten Ansatz, wie du diese neue Arbeitsweise in deinem Unternehmen einführen kannst, und zeige die häufigsten Fehler auf, die bei der Einführung von OKRs gemacht werden.

Ich bin seit 15 Jahren Vollzeit-Projektmanager und Consultant und zeige dir, worauf es in der Praxis ankommt.

Du kannst dichauf die folgenden Themen freuen:

  • Was sind OKRs?

  • Wie können OKRs in der Praxis eingesetzt werden?

  • Wie kann ich OKRs in meinem Unternehmen einführen?

  • Welche Fehler sollten bei der Einführung von OKRs vermieden werden?


Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses wirst du ein gutes Verständnis dafür haben, was OKRs bedeuten und du sie erfolgreich einsetzen kannst.

OKRs sind Ziele und Schlüsselergebnisse in einem. Sie beschreiben die gewünschten Ergebnisse in einem prägnanten, umsetzbaren Format.

Sie geben dir Orientierung und einen Rahmen für die Festlegung von Zielen und die Messung des Fortschritts an ihnen. Du kannst deine Fortschritte auf dem Weg zum Ziel verfolgen, indem du deine Schlüsselergebnisse nachverfolgst. Außerdem kannst du deine Leistung mit der des gesamten Unternehmens vergleichen.


- Das Grundprinzip der OKRs ist einfach -

"Definieren Sie, was Sie erreichen wollen, und messen Sie dann Ihre Fortschritte auf dem Weg dorthin." Dieses einfache Konzept bietet eine neue Denkweise darüber, wie du deine Arbeit angehen kannst.


Hier findest du einen Überblick über die Themen unserer OKR-Schulung:

  • Warum gibt es OKRs und woher kommt das Konnzept?

  • Was sind überhaupt OKRs und was bedeutet es für uns?

  • Einige Beispiele für OKRs

  • OKR Definition - darauf solltest du achten!

  • OKRs vs Tagesgeschäft: Fokus auf das Wesentliche

  • Outcome vs Output bei OKRs

  • OKRs und lose Koppelung

  • OKRs und KPIs - wie passt das zusammen?

  • Bottom-up und Top-Down Planung von Zielen

  • Wie wollen wir OKR ins Unternehmen einbauen?

  • OKR Rollout im Unternehmen - wie gehen wir vor?

  • Typische OKR Fehler und die du sie vermeidest.
targetAudiences: Projektmanager und Führungskräfte, die ihre Ziele klar und messbar machen wollen
Jeder der im Job und privat Ziele setzen und erreichen möchte
Alle, die intelligente Ziele setzen und verwirklichen wollen
Du bist hier richtig, wenn du modernes Projektmanagement lernen willst

courseDetails.title: DIY “Runners & Laced-up Boots” With Printable Patterns
courseDetails.shortDescription: Make custom-fitted leather moccasins & boots with laces, adapted to your foot shape and size.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Over the course of this step-by-step video tutorial of 04h30 minutes, Lougaya demonstrates how to make a pair of moccasins with laces in 3 different styles (under the ankle, above the ankle, and lined with sheepskin). The whole tutorial is about three and a half hours of teaching, divided into small sections that are easy to view and replay at your own rhythm.

Along with the video tutorial, you will get a PDF tutorial that highlights all the details to remember in written explanations and clear images.

You will also get two whole sets of printable patterns (for the runners and for the boots) that will cover all sizes and morphology types, from size 32 EU to 48 EU / 4 US women to 14 US men.

Just like a second skin...

Our moccasins are like barefoot or minimalist leather shoes, 100% in leather. In fact, they truly are like a second skin that can be worn on all occasions and on all grounds. If you are looking for natural footwear with high sensory feedback, you're at the right place.

We are convinced that even people without prior experience in leather work, sewing, and shoe making can complete this project quite easily.

The great difference with most other moccasins and patterns that you can find on the market is that ours are made to be adjusted exactly to the morphology of each person.

We are convinced that even people without prior experience in leather work or sewing can complete this project quite easily.

With practice, a pair can be made in only 3 to 4 hours, but it would usually take about 1 day on the first trial.

Patterns should be printed in A4 or US letters. If you are not able to print the patterns at home, please send us a request.

The tutorials also cover the topics of choosing leather and tools, making soles, leather conditioner, and more.

To make good-looking and comfortable moccasins, you need to find very soft leather that will easily pucker around the toes. Ideally, it should be thick as well (1.8 to 3 mm thick / 4 to 6 oz leather). We know that such leather is not that easy to find, especially when you can't go to a leather shop in person and/or that you are a novice.

Feel free to reach out to us if you need help finding the best quality leather suitable to work with our patterns at contact@earthingmoccasins.com

courseDetails.title: Crea tu propio Blog profesional MVC con PHP POO MySQL
courseDetails.shortDescription: aprende a programar y crear un blog completo usando el lenguaje de programacion PHP
courseDetails.longDescription:
Para crear un blog con PHP, hay varios pasos que debes seguir. Aquí tienes una guía básica para comenzar:

Paso 1: Configurar el entorno de desarrollo

  • Instala un servidor web local en tu computadora, como Apache.

  • Instala PHP en tu servidor web local.

  • Configura tu servidor web para que admita PHP.

Paso 2: Configurar una base de datos

  • Instala un sistema de gestión de bases de datos, como MySQL o SQLite.

  • Crea una base de datos para tu blog.

Paso 3: Estructurar tu proyecto

  • Crea una carpeta para tu proyecto y crea los archivos necesarios dentro de ella.

  • Puedes organizar tus archivos utilizando el patrón de diseño Modelo-Vista-Controlador (MVC) para una estructura más limpia y modular.

Paso 4: Crear la interfaz de usuario

  • Crea archivos HTML y CSS para diseñar la interfaz de usuario de tu blog.

  • Puedes utilizar CSS frameworks como Bootstrap para facilitar el diseño.

Paso 5: Conectar a la base de datos

  • Utiliza las funciones de PHP para conectarte a la base de datos que configuraste anteriormente.

  • Establece la conexión y maneja posibles errores.

Paso 6: Crear las funcionalidades del blog

  • Crea archivos PHP para manejar las diferentes funcionalidades del blog, como la creación de publicaciones, la visualización de publicaciones, los comentarios, etc.

  • Utiliza sentencias SQL para realizar consultas a la base de datos y mostrar o almacenar la información necesaria.

Paso 7: Implementar la lógica del blog

  • Utiliza PHP para controlar la lógica de tu blog, como la validación de formularios, el manejo de sesiones de usuario, la autenticación, etc.

Paso 8: Prueba y depuración

  • Prueba tu blog en diferentes escenarios para asegurarte de que todas las funcionalidades funcionen correctamente.

  • Utiliza herramientas de depuración de PHP para identificar y solucionar errores.

Paso 9: Publicar tu blog

  • Sube los archivos de tu blog a un servidor web en vivo, asegurándote de que el servidor tenga soporte para PHP y una base de datos compatible.

  • Configura la conexión a la base de datos y los archivos de configuración necesarios en el servidor en vivo.

Estos son solo los pasos básicos para crear un blog con PHP. A medida que avances, puedes agregar más funcionalidades y mejorar el diseño de tu blog. Recuerda también considerar aspectos de seguridad, como filtrar y validar los datos de entrada, para evitar ataques de seguridad.
targetAudiences: Desarrolladores web
Desarrolladores PHP y MySQL
Diseñadores industriales con interes en desarrollo web

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear un Blog con WordPress y ChatGPT Desde Cero
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear un blog con WordPress y ChatGPT desde cero, de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN BLOG WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CHATGPT PARA GENERAR INGRESOS POR INTERNET?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


ChatGPT es un sistema de chat basado en el modelo de lenguaje por Inteligencia Artificial GPT-3, desarrollado por la empresa OpenAI. Es un modelo con más de 175 millones de parámetros, y entrenado con grandes cantidades de texto para realizar tareas relacionadas con el lenguaje, desde la traducción hasta la generación de texto.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un blog con WordPress,  también utilizaremos la plataforma de ChatGPT que nos brindará el apoyo y la información necesaria para diseñar nuestro blog en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su blog con WordPress y ChatGPT, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su blog diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

courseDetails.title: Build Your Best Cold Email Strategy!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Set up an effective cold email campaign that will help you increase open rates and conversions!
courseDetails.longDescription:
No matter what product you sell or what services provide, in the modern crowded digital world, it can be difficult to get noticed as there may be dozens or even hundreds of other businesses competing for the attention of potential customers. Cold email can help to cut through the noise and get your message in front of people who might not otherwise have heard about your business. It is also the most cost-effective way to reach a large audience which will definitely come in handy if you have a startup and are limited in budget.


Cold email is a great marketing tool that involves sending unsolicited emails to potential customers or clients. It is typically used as a way to reach out to a large number of people at once, with the goal of getting them to take some kind of action. With a well-thought cold email strategy, you are more likely to engage a highly targeted audience that is interested in your product or service.


WHAT WILL YOU LEARN IN THIS COURSE?

  • After completing this course, you will know how to create a successful cold email campaign that will help you reach a wider audience without spending a lot of money on advertising: from finding prospects and their email addresses to email personalization and scaling your outreach sequences

  • Find out the key differences between cold emails and spam so that your cold emails never get into spam folders

  • Get to know how to choose only verified email addresses for cold outreach with the help of Hunter in order to increase the likelihood that recipients will take action

  • Learn how to enable email automation of your campaigns using email templates and dynamic attributes to save a ton of time

  • Understand how to write cold emails that get responses and how to build authority backlinks with cold outreach


Get the knack for cold emailing right now!


My name is Anton Voroniuk and I would like to teach you how to set up an effective cold email campaign step-by-step. I am the CEO of the Digital Marketing Academy SkillsBooster, and a co-owner of Webpromo Agency. During this time I have created hundreds of effective and engaging email campaigns that connected with customers and drove results. Now I’m ready to teach you how to build your best cold marketing email strategy from scratch!


YOU’LL HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN COLD EMAIL MARKETING FROM TOP DIGITAL MARKETING PROFESSIONALS:

  • We have over 14 years of experience in online marketing. Our Webpromo Agency has both Google Premier Partner status and Facebook Marketing Partner status.

  • I've personally collected a vast amount of digital marketing qualifications and marketing certifications (Google Analytics Individual Qualification, Google Ads Individual Qualification, Bing Ads Accredited Professional, Search Ads360 Certified, and others).

  • We've launched over 1,500 successful marketing strategies and campaigns throughout our careers.

  • Over 430,000 digital marketing specialists worldwide have enrolled in our online courses. Our free online events, blog, and YouTube tutorials help the SkillsBooster community stay in the loop and get all the tips they need to succeed in digital marketing.


OUR COLD EMAIL TRAINING INCLUDES:

  • Theory: 1+ hours of lectures with plenty of hands-on examples. Lessons range from 3 to 15 minutes and are easy to follow.

  • Practice Materials: Cold Marketing Strategy Checklist, Cold Email Checklist, templates, and video tutorials to make the course more interactive and valuable.

  • Lifetime access to the course and its future updates.

  • 24/7 Support: If you have questions, I will always be willing to answer them.

  • Complete the course and receive an Udemy certificate.


Sign up now! Don’t miss your chance to get the full guide on cold outreach with best practices, tips, and ready-to-use email templates. This course comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee!

Sounds like something that can help you achieve your goals? Click “Enroll”, and see you at the following lecture.

courseDetails.title: Sıfırdan Konuşturan İngilizce Kursu (22+ Saat)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Kurs ortasında bile istemsizce konuşmaya başlayacaksınız.
courseDetails.longDescription:
• Bir dil en iyi doğal haliyle öğrenilir, yani çocukların öğrendiği gibi, kelimeleri sık sık duyarak.


• Hem Türkçe hem Kürtçe konuşan arkadaşınızın neden İngilizce öğrenemediğini hiç düşündünüz mü?


• İngilizce zor diye mi?


• En zor dil hangisi?


• Size göre Çince mi?


• Peki 2 milyar insan Çinceyi nasıl konuşuyor?


• Peki okuma yazma bilmeyen anne babanın bile çocuğuna konuşma dilini öğretirken, üniversitede öğretmenlik okumuş birinin neden dil öğretemediğini?


• Peki anne baba çocuğa Türkçeyi öğretmeye neden fiilimsilerden değilde mama gibi en temel kelimelerden başlıyor?


• Ana dilini öğrenen herkes başka bir dili de öğrenebilir. Lakin doğru yöntem ile. Bu doğru yöntem de ana dilimizi öğrenirken kullandığımız yöntemdir. Yani Çok Tekrar, Sık Tekrar. Bir kelimeyi ilk defa gördüğünüzde öğrenmeyi amaçlamayın. Aynı kelimeyi 40 50 defa belki daha fazla görmelisinizki doğaçlama konuşurken dilinize kolayca yansıyabilsin. İşte bu kursta hem çok tekrarı hemde sık tekrarı bulacaksınız. Bir derste gördüğünüz bir kelime 3 ders sonra, 5 ders sonra, 10 ders sonra tekrar karşınıza çıkacak. Böylelikle hem öğrenmiş, hem pekiştirmiş hemde içselleştirmiş olacaksınız.


• Çünkü sizin başlık başlık gramer konularını bilmenize gerek yok. Konuşurken kapının kolu demek için bunun isim tamlaması olduğunu bilmenize gerek var mı? Tabiki yok. İngilizcede de aynı şey geçerli. Önemli olan kelime ve kuralları içselleştirip konuşabilmek.


• Bu güne kadar gördüğünüz tüm dil eğitimlerini unutun.


• Bu kurs ile İngilizce konuşacaksınız.


• Bu kurs ile İngilizceyi doğal olarak öğreneceksiniz.


• Bu kursta tabularınız yıkılacak ve İngilizce öğrenebileceğinizi göreceksiniz.
targetAudiences: İngilizce öğrenmeye meraklı
Dil öğrenmek isteyen
İngilizce öğrenmek isteyen
İngilizce konuşmak isteyen

courseDetails.title: EXCEL para principiantes enfocado a los  negocios
courseDetails.shortDescription: »Curso Excel pensando en principiantes para productividad en los negocios y empresas actualizado a la ultima versión «
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿Alguna vez te has preguntado cómo empresas usan Excel en el manejo de sus datos?


Realizado con la ultima versión disponible para 2021 de este programa. Este curso persigue que los estudiantes adquieran destrezas en el uso de Excel, pero con un enfoque orientado  a los negocios. 

Al finalizar el curso, podrás crear archivos tales como: Nóminas, informes financieros, gráficos estadísticos, presupuestos y todo documento relacionado con hojas de cálculo . Este curso va desde los conocimientos más básicos del programa hasta prepararte para llegar al nivel más avanzado

He diseñado este curso de Excel para que todo principiante pueda crear archivos de hojas de calculo, por lo que te garantizamos un aprendizaje amplio y rápido.

Al final de curso tendrás disponible una serie de repositorios web para que puedas alcanzar el nivel avanzado de este programa.

Las aplicaciones de Excel son prácticas, pero también pueden ser divertidas. Veamos cuáles son algunos de los mejores usos del programa:

  • Cálculo: Puedes crear una calculadora personalizada en Excel para operaciones matemáticas que tengas que realizar a menudo. Simplemente tendrás que insertar las cifras y tendrás la solución.

  • Contabilidad: Desde crear informes financieros hasta registrar gastos y elaborar presupuestos, según estadísticas reveladas por GoSkills, un 89% de compañías usan Excel por sus funciones de contabilidad. Hay muchas plantillas gratuitas que puedes usar para tal fin.

  • Gráficos: En vez de mostrar tus datos en una hoja de cálculo puedes transformarlos en un gráfico visual y fácil de interpretar.

  • Registro de inventario: Puedes mantener un registro muy sencillo de tu inventario en Excel.

  • Calendarios y horarios: Ya sea para planear tu semana o fijar las reuniones para todo el equipo, en Excel puedes crear un horario muy claro dividido por colores para mejorar tu organización.

  • Fijar metas: Puedes usar las hojas de cálculo para crear un planning de metas. Imaginemos que te propones ir al gimnasio 3 veces a la semana: podrías colocar tu meta en una columna, tu objetivo en otra y después ir marcando cada día de la semana que lo consigas para poder marcar la casilla de ‘alcanzado’ al ir el tercer día. El sistema visual te motivará.

  • Elabora prototipos: Si estás diseñando una página web puedes usar Excel para crear los prototipos de algunos elementos.

  • Lista de tareas: En Excel puedes crear una lista de tareas y registrar con porcentajes lo cerca que estas de completar cada una de ellas.

  • Lista de ‘quehaceres’: Puedes apuntar todas las tareas más pequeñas que tengas que hacer, como mandar un correo o comprar leche, y tacharlo de tu lista de ‘quehaceres’ en Excel.

  • Repartir tareas: Crea gráficos de distintos estilos para repartir tareas entre los miembros de tu equipo. Podréis marcarlo en el gráfico cuando esté completo e incluso distribuirlo estilo Trello.

  • Mantén un registro del tiempo: Si quieres aprender a gestionar mejor tu tiempo puedes mantener un registro de los minutos u horas que tardas en completar cada acción. Con el cálculo automático puedes ver cuántas horas has trabajado en la semana y compararlo con lo que has logrado.

  • Crea formularios: Los menús desplegables que puedes añadir en las celdas en Excel lo convierten en una herramienta fantástica para crear formularios.

  • Prepara facturas: También puedes preparar facturas en Excel. De hecho, hay algunas plantillas gratuitas diseñadas para ello.

  • Planea un viaje: En Excel puedes planear el itinerario de tu próximo viaje, incluso tienen una plantilla diseñada especialmente para tal fin.

  • Crea un sudoku: Puedes usar Excel para divertirte y entrenar la mente creando Sudokus.

  • Mantén un registro de tus logros: Ya sea los kilos que has perdido en una semana o los restaurantes que has visitado en el último mes, puedes mantener un registro de tus logros en Excel y usar los cálculos automáticos para ver el resultado final.

  • Calcular el IVA: Puedes usar las hojas de cálculo de Excel para calcular el IVA.

  • Crea listas de invitados: Puedes registrar todos los detalles de tus invitados, junto a su dirección para organizarte mejor. Además, si se trata de un evento de networking, por ejemplo, puedes imprimir los nombres de los invitados de manera rápida y sencilla y crear etiquetas para que se identifiquen.

  • Crea un CRM: Lo bueno de crear tu CRM en Excel es que será más personalizable. Además, hay bastantes plantillas disponibles para tal fin.

Te espero en el curso.
targetAudiences: Este curso  va dirigido a personas que quieren usar Excel de forma practica en su negocio personal o en su espacio de trabajo.
Estudiantes de contabilidad , administración de empresas y carreras a fines que quieren dominar con facilidad  Excel

courseDetails.title: Memory Leaks 101: Your Guide to Fixing Them in Web Apps
courseDetails.shortDescription: Boost your web app’s performance by writing optimized code and using Chrome DevTools
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hunting memory leaks issues is a complex problem with fiendish edge cases, and debugging them can be a daunting task. To avoid such a problem in your app, you need awareness about it and constant vigilance.

JavaScript memory leaks are sneaky and could be challenging to localize because they can go unnoticed for some time. And even if your performance gets progressively worse, you will not see a thrown error on the browser while running the leaking app because it’s not an invalid code that causes memory leaks, but a logical flaw in it.

In this course, we’ll see how to effectively track memory leaks down and learn what causes them. You’ll get insights on how to respect more the end-user device’s resources. You’ll also avoid situations where you pull your hair out trying to understand what’s going on with your performance.

I designed this course to suit newcomers as well as advanced developers, and I will walk you through the topic step by step until you get your hands dirty.

At the end of the course, you’ll be able to identify, diagnose, and fix memory leaks in web apps even if you’re not the one who implemented them. You’ll be also able to catch patterns in your source code that cause leaks.
targetAudiences: For people who want to optimize their runtime web performance and/or fix memory leaks in their web pages.
For frontend developers who want to know more about web development.
For people who want to have more insights on how to use chrome DevTools.

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Gas Station & Petrol Station Management 2.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Gas Station Management, Filling station Management,Petrol Station Management,Petrol Bunk Management,Oil and Gas Industry
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Gas Station & Petrol Station Management 2.0

Managing a gas station involves much more than just pumping gas and collecting payments. It requires a comprehensive approach to ensure smooth operations and maximize profitability. Petrol stations, also known as gas stations or service stations, play a crucial role in our daily lives, providing fuel for transportation and various convenience services. To ensure smooth operations and customer satisfaction, effective petrol station management is essential.

Efficient gas station an petrol station management involves a holistic approach that encompasses inventory management, pricing strategies, maintenance, customer service, technology integration, marketing, and environmental responsibility. By implementing these strategies, gas station managers can optimize operations, enhance customer experience, and drive profitability. Stay ahead of the competition and ensure the success of your gas station by adopting these best practices in gas station and petrol station management.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics,

1. Gas station and petrol station management: introduction and importance

2. The challenges of implementing a gas station business plan

3. The challenges facing gas stations today and how technology can help

4. Gas station dealerships: how to get and become one

5. How to become an effective gas station manager
targetAudiences: All UG and PG Business, Oil and Gas Industry Students, Entrepreneurs, Filling station exectives and Gas station owners
Interested learners to learn about the concepts of Gas Station, Filling station, Petrol Station Management

courseDetails.title: Advanced Master Course in Banking and Insurance 3.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Banking, Insurance, Fintech, Banking and Finance, Digital banking,Insurance Adjusting, Life insurance,Health Insurance,
courseDetails.longDescription:
Advanced master course in banking and insurance 3.0

The banking and insurance industry is an integral part of our modern society, playing a significant role in managing financial transactions and mitigating risks. This advanced master course aims to delve into the intricacies of these sectors, highlighting their vital functions, challenges, and the current trends shaping their future.

The insurance Industry: Protecting Lives and Assets:

Insurance is a fundamental component of the financial services sector, providing individuals and businesses with protection against various risks. Insurance companies offer policies that cover contingencies such as health issues, accidents, natural disasters, and property damage. These policies provide individuals with peace of mind and businesses with financial security in times of crisis.

The banking and insurance industry plays a vital role in enabling economic growth, managing risks, and safeguarding financial well-being. While facing ongoing challenges, such as technological advancements and regulatory compliance, the industry is also embracing disruptive trends that will shape its future. By leveraging technology, adopting sustainable practices, and prioritizing customer-centric solutions, the banking and insurance industry can continue to thrive and meet the evolving needs of the global community.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 5 major topics

1. Introduction and importance of banking and insurance 3.0

2. Fundamentals, Process, Products, Principles of banking and insurance

3. How recent technology supports the banking and insurance system

4. Banking and Insurance with Block chain and how support with the business sectors

5. Managerial skills for banking and insurance and how to become one
targetAudiences: All UG and PG Finance, Business, Commerce, Banking & Insurance Students.
Banking employees, Business executives of banking and insurance industry

courseDetails.title: Konuşturan İngilizce Kursu (A2 — B1)
courseDetails.shortDescription: Bu kurs en az 30 saat olacaktır. Bu kursta öğrendiğiniz kelimeleri ve cümle yapılarıyla İngilizce konuşabileceksiniz.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Sıfırdan Konuşturan İngilizce Kursunda belirttiğim gibi bir yabancı dil ancak çok tekrar ve sık tekrar ile öğrenilir. Örneğin; masa kelimesini derste bir kere duyduğunuzda onu konuşurken kullanmanız neredeyse imkansızdır. Masada ders çalışırım. Benim masam mavidir. Kardeşime de bir masa alacağız. Biz yemeği masada yemeyiz. Masamın altında oyun oynamayı severim. gibi bir çok cümleye maruz kalmanız gerekir. Bu maruz bırakmayı öncelikle öğretmenin yapması gerekir. Daha sonra öğrenci zaten yaptığı okumalar ve dinlemelerle pekiştirecektir.


Masa örneğinden devam edeyim. A0 ve A1 seviyesinde genellikle günlük hayatta çok sık rastlayacağımız somut kelimeler vardır. Dolayısıyla öğrenmek ve akılda kalıcılık biraz daha kolaydır. Lakin A2 ve B1 seviyesine geldiğinizde kelime yoğunluğu biraz daha soyut ve karmaşık kelimelere doğru kayar. Ancak burda da yine yapılacak şey çok tekrar ve sık tekrardır.

courseDetails.title: HTML and CSS: A Beginner's Guide to Web Development (2023)

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Learn HTML and CSS with Projects - A Beginner Course 2023"! In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of HTML and CSS, two essential languages for building websites.

You will learn by doing throughout the course as you complete hands-on projects that will allow you to practise and apply your new skills. Whether you are a complete novice or have some coding experience, this course will help you establish a solid foundation in HTML and CSS.


Some of the topics you will cover in this course include:


The structure of a basic HTML page

Adding text, images, and other elements to a page

Formatting text and content with CSS

Creating navigation menus and links

Working with layout and positioning

Building forms and other interactive elements


By the end of this course, you will have the skills and confidence you need to build your own basic websites, and you will be ready to take your learning to the next level.


Join me now for "Learn HTML and CSS with Projects - A Beginner Course 2023" if you're ready to learn HTML and CSS and start constructing your own websites!


HTML is a markup language that is commonly used to generate and organise web pages. It is a web building piece that defines the content and structure of a web page.


CSS  is a stylesheet language used to describe the appearance and formatting of an HTML document. It is used to control the look of web pages, such as colours, fonts, layout, and other design elements.

HTML and CSS, when used together, are fundamental tools for anyone who wishes to construct or design websites. HTML adds content and structure to a page, while CSS controls the appearance and style of that content.


This course will teach you the fundamentals of HTML and CSS, as well as how to utilise them together to construct simple websites. You will learn how to add text, photos, and other items to a page, as well as how to style and format them with CSS. You will also learn how to construct navigation menus, links, and other interactive features.


By the completion of this course, you will have the skills and knowledge required to design your own basic websites, and you will be ready to advance your studies. Whether you are a newbie trying to get started with web development or an experienced developer looking to refresh your skills, this course is a great place to start.

courseDetails.title: DIY "Trimini" Sandals - Minimalist Leather Sandals
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to make you own barefoot or minimalist sandals by hand, from the outline of your feet, in just a few hours.
courseDetails.longDescription:
The "Trimini" Sandals are easy to make from an outline of your feet to ensure that they will be perfectly adapted to your foot shape and size.

In this tutorial, Lougaya will demonstrate how to make minimalist sandals with vegetable-tanned leather. She will explain how to make these barefoot-sandals from A to Z. It will cover the topics of making your own patterns from the outline of one's feet, cutting the thick leather, adding soles, burnishing the edge of the leather to give a professional finish to your home-made sandals and of course, lacing them up.


We believe that even beginners can achieve this project in 2.5 to 5 hours. This tutorial is very beginner-friendly. Only simple tools will be used, and you probably have already most of them at home already.


These minimalist sandals are made for optimum stability, durability, and lightness. Their design has been refined to be as stable as possible and minimize the pressure and rubbing that could be caused by the laces. When well-adjusted, the laces won’t need to be touched up anymore, and it will become easy to slip them on in an instant.

Their design of these sandals was studied for more comfort and stability:
- The heel tab that comes up until the ankle, offering a very good hold by preventing the foot to slide backward and keeping the laces from rubbing on the skin.
- The extension of the sole on the inner side of the foot to completely cover and protect the most vulnerable part of our feet: the arch.
- Their zero-drop / flat sole doesn't affect your natural posture.
- The decorative piece on the insteps keeps the tension right and minimizes the pressure on the instep that could be caused by the laces alone.

They can be made with or without a rubber sole. Of course, the rubber sole increases their durability, their resistance to water and offers a better grip on smooth surfaces.
targetAudiences: Anyone interested in making their own minimalist and comfortable sandals/footwear
People that struggle to find sandals in their foot shape and size in shops
Those who are interested in barefoot or minimalist shoes and barefoot walking

Leather craftsmen interested in new projects

This comprehensive course is designed to teach you the fundamentals of JavaScript, one of the most widely used programming languages in the world. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, this course will provide you with a solid foundation in JavaScript and equip you with the skills and knowledge you need to create dynamic and interactive web pages.

Throughout the course, you'll learn about a wide range of topics, from connecting JavaScript with HTML to working with arrays and objects, loops, and functions. You'll also learn about JavaScript data types, operators, events, and error handling, as well as how to use sets and maps in JavaScript.

The course is structured in a logical and easy-to-follow manner, with each section building on the concepts and skills covered in the previous one. You'll start by learning the basics of JavaScript programming, including how to output data, use variables and data types, and write programs and statements. You'll then move on to more advanced topics, such as working with arrays and strings, using operators, and writing functions.

One of the highlights of the course is the section on objects, which provides a comprehensive overview of how to work with objects in JavaScript. You'll learn about object properties and methods, how to create and use objects, and how to work with object prototypes and inheritance.

The course also includes a section on JavaScript events, which is essential for creating dynamic and interactive web pages. You'll learn how to handle user events such as clicks, key presses, and form submissions, as well as how to use event listeners and handlers.

Throughout the course, you'll have ample opportunity to practice what you've learned through coding exercises and quizzes. You'll also have access to a variety of resources, including downloadable code examples, a glossary of JavaScript terms, and a discussion forum where you can ask questions and interact with other students.

By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of the fundamentals of JavaScript programming and be equipped with the skills and knowledge you need to create dynamic and interactive web pages. Whether you're interested in front-end web development, back-end scripting, or desktop application development, the skills you'll learn in this course will be invaluable.

So what are you waiting for? Enroll today and start your journey toward mastering JavaScript!

This assessment helps to employees and companies in internal certification procedures.

! Its not a course with theory, its exam for certification / assessment

    please also provide name/surname at Udemy and your preferred name for diploma


Assessment Description:

The Blockchain Expert Certification holds immense significance for both employees and companies alike, as blockchain continues to revolutionize industries across the globe.


Importance for Employees:

Specialized Knowledge: Obtaining a Blockchain Expert Certification demonstrates a high level of competence and understanding of blockchain technology. It equips employees with specialized knowledge that sets them apart from their peers and opens up new career opportunities.


Career Advancement: With the growing adoption of blockchain technology, certified professionals are in high demand across various industries. Blockchain certification enhances employability and provides employees with a competitive edge, facilitating career advancement and potential salary growth.


Industry Recognition: A Blockchain Expert Certification is a recognized validation of an individual's expertise in blockchain technology. It establishes credibility and demonstrates a commitment to professional growth, garnering respect within the industry.


Versatile Skill Set: Blockchain expertise encompasses various areas such as cryptography, decentralized applications, smart contracts, and consensus mechanisms. This diverse skill set allows professionals to explore roles in blockchain development, project management, consulting, and research, providing versatility in career options.


Future-Proofing Careers: Blockchain technology is poised to disrupt numerous industries, including finance, supply chain, healthcare, and more. By gaining blockchain expertise, employees future-proof their careers, ensuring relevance and adaptability in the evolving job market.


Importance for Companies:

Innovation and Competitiveness: Companies that embrace blockchain technology gain a competitive advantage by harnessing its transformative potential. Hiring certified blockchain experts enables organizations to innovate, explore new business models, and develop blockchain-based solutions that enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.


Effective Implementation: Blockchain implementations require specialized knowledge to navigate the complexities and challenges associated with decentralized systems. Certified professionals possess the necessary skills to lead and manage blockchain initiatives, ensuring successful and effective implementation within the organization.


Risk Mitigation: Blockchain technology offers enhanced security, transparency, and immutability, mitigating risks such as fraud, data tampering, and identity theft. By hiring certified blockchain experts, companies can leverage this technology to safeguard their digital assets and protect against potential threats.


Industry Partnerships and Collaboration: Many blockchain initiatives involve collaboration among multiple organizations. Having certified experts facilitates partnerships and collaborations, as companies with certified professionals gain credibility and trust among potential collaborators.


Talent Attraction and Retention: The demand for blockchain professionals exceeds the current supply, making it a highly competitive job market. Companies offering blockchain certifications to their employees demonstrate a commitment to fostering talent development, attracting top talent, and retaining skilled professionals within the organization.


Building a Career in Blockchain:

Building a career in blockchain provides numerous opportunities for growth and impact. With the increasing adoption of blockchain across industries, professionals with blockchain expertise are sought after for roles such as blockchain developers, solution architects, consultants, project managers, and researchers.


Additionally, blockchain professionals can contribute to the development of decentralized applications, explore entrepreneurship opportunities through blockchain startups, or work in regulatory and policy-making bodies shaping the future of blockchain technology.


Continuous learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in blockchain technology is crucial for career growth. Pursuing advanced certifications, attending industry conferences, and actively engaging in blockchain communities helps professionals stay at the forefront of this rapidly evolving field.


The Blockchain Expert Certification holds immense importance for both employees and companies. For employees, it provides specialized knowledge, enhances career prospects, and establishes industry recognition. For companies, it enables innovation, effective implementation, risk mitigation, and talent attraction.


By investing in blockchain certifications, individuals and organizations can unlock the transformative potential of blockchain technology, contributing to their personal and professional growth, as well as the overall advancement of the industry.

Assessment Description:

The Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification is specifically tailored for individuals aspiring to or currently holding leadership positions in digital transformation and strategy.


Importance for Employees:

Obtaining a Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification can significantly benefit employees in various ways. Firstly, it provides individuals with a solid foundation in digital transformation and digital business strategies. This knowledge is increasingly essential in today's technology-driven world, where businesses must adapt to stay competitive. By acquiring this certification, employees demonstrate their expertise in leading digital initiatives, enabling them to become valuable assets within their organizations.


Secondly, the CDO Certification enhances career prospects by opening up new opportunities in the digital field. Companies across industries are actively seeking professionals who can drive digital innovation and transformation. With this certification, employees can showcase their proficiency in developing and implementing digital strategies, which gives them a competitive edge in the job market.


Furthermore, the CDO Certification helps employees develop a comprehensive skill set necessary for successful digital leadership. It covers a wide range of topics, including digital marketing, data analytics, cybersecurity, user experience, and emerging technologies. This diverse knowledge equips individuals with the ability to navigate complex digital landscapes, make data-driven decisions, and drive organizational growth.


Importance for Companies:

For companies, having employees certified as Chief Digital Officers brings numerous advantages. Firstly, certified CDOs possess the expertise needed to drive digital transformation initiatives. They understand the intricacies of digital technologies, consumer behavior, and industry trends, enabling them to develop effective strategies that align with business goals. With a certified CDO at the helm, companies can accelerate their digital transformation efforts and stay ahead of the competition.


Secondly, certified CDOs are equipped to optimize customer experiences and engagement. They possess a deep understanding of digital marketing techniques, user experience design, and data analytics. This expertise allows them to leverage customer insights and implement personalized strategies that enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention.


Moreover, CDO Certification ensures that companies have leaders who can effectively manage digital risks and cybersecurity threats. With the increasing reliance on digital platforms and data, organizations must prioritize data privacy, protection, and compliance. Certified CDOs are well-versed in implementing robust cybersecurity measures and establishing data governance frameworks, mitigating risks and safeguarding sensitive information.


Digital Transformation and Digital Business:

Digital Transformation and Digital Business topics covered in the CDO Certification are highly valuable for building a career. In today's digital era, businesses are continuously evolving to leverage technology for innovation, efficiency, and growth. Professionals who possess expertise in digital transformation and digital business strategies are in high demand across industries.


Understanding the fundamentals of digital transformation enables individuals to identify opportunities for disruption, create agile and customer-centric strategies, and drive organizational change. Digital business topics equip professionals with the knowledge to leverage emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence, blockchain, and the Internet of Things, to develop innovative business models, improve operational efficiency, and create new revenue streams.


Professionals with expertise in digital transformation and digital business are well-positioned for leadership roles in various industries, including finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. They have the skills to navigate the evolving digital landscape, embrace emerging technologies, and lead organizations through successful digital transformations.


The Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification plays a crucial role in equipping professionals with the necessary knowledge, skills, and credentials to excel in the digital world. It provides employees with a competitive advantage, enhances career prospects, and enables them to become valuable assets to their organizations. For companies, having certified CDOs empowers them to drive digital transformation, optimize customer experiences, and manage digital risks effectively. Moreover, the digital transformation and digital business topics covered in the certification are instrumental in building a successful career in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.

courseDetails.title: AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty 2023
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master AWS Machine Learning: Practice Questions and Expert Insights to Ace the Certification Exam! (MLS-C01)
courseDetails.longDescription:
================ INFO ABOUT THE EXAM ================

Level: Specialty

Length: 180 minutes to complete the exam

Cost: 300 USD

Format: 65 questions; either multiple choice or multiple response.

Delivery method: Pearson VUE testing center or online proctored exam.


Who should take this exam?

AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty is intended for individuals who perform a development or data science role and have more than one year of experience developing, architecting, or running machine learning/deep learning workloads in the AWS Cloud.

Before you take this exam, we recommend you have:

  • At least two years of hands-on experience developing, architecting, and running ML or deep learning workloads in the AWS Cloud

  • Ability to express the intuition behind basic ML algorithms

  • Experience performing basic hyperparameter optimization

  • Experience with ML and deep learning frameworks

  • Ability to follow model-training, deployment, and operational best practices


What does it take to earn this certification?

To earn this certification, you’ll need to take and pass the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty exam (MLS-C01). The exam features a combination of two question formats: multiple choice and multiple response. Additional information, such as the exam content outline and passing score, is in the exam guide.


================ COURSE DESCRIPTION ================

Welcome to the ultimate AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty 2023 Exam prep course! This comprehensive program is designed to help you master the knowledge and skills needed to pass the certification exam with flying colors.

Our course offers a perfect reflection of the real exam, featuring 5 tests of 65 questions each, with the time limit exactly the same as in real life. You'll get plenty of practice with challenging questions that cover all exam domains, including data security, access control, monitoring and logging, and more.

Each test is designed to simulate the actual exam experience, allowing you to build your confidence and test-taking strategies.

In addition, each question contains a detailed explanation, which was placed immediately after completing the given test. These explanations describe in detail:

  • the technology to which the question relates,

  • why this answer is correct or why it is the best answer,

  • links to places in the documentation.

Whether you're a novice or an experienced professional, this course will provide the knowledge and skills you need to pass the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Security Exam and advance your career in the exciting and rapidly growing field of machine learning security. Enroll today and get ready to take your skills to the next level!


================ FAQ ================

Can I take the practice test more than once?

You can take each practical test multiple times.

What result is required?

The required grade for each practice test is 75% correct answers.

What is the time limit for one exam?

The time for each exam is 180 minutes.

Can I see my answers?

You can review all the answers for completing a given test.
targetAudiences: everyone who are about to take the AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty exam
everyone who wants to become an AWS Certified Machine Learning - Specialty

courseDetails.title: Mongoose, Test-Driven Development , NestJS, Jest
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprenda sobre o funcionamento do Mongoose focando em testes, vol. 1  (1° edição)
courseDetails.longDescription:
Gostaria de conhecer o curso?

Olhe as seções anexadas, todas estão como prévia, incluindo cortes do curso!

===

Minha história com o Mongoose

Usei o Mongoose no projeto "Desenho e Desenvolvimento de uma aplicação web baseado em JavaScript para a plataforma Teranóstico". Gostei muito da biblioteca, por ser fácil de usar, e permite programar o MongoDB de dentro do Node.js.  Um dos pontos fortes do MEAN é a possibilidade de se programar todo o stack usando JavaScript: o Mongoose torna isso ainda mais fácil, além de ser amigável ao formato JSON.  Também tenho respondido perguntas no Stack Overflow.

===

===

Sobre o curso

O curso procura colocar vários conceitos em um mesmo espaço, sendo assim, como apontou um estudante em forma de feedback público, posso me “contradizer”. Sugiro fortemente que assista às prévias e aos vídeos no YouTube que sugiro antes de comprar o curso. Minha didática tem funcionado, contudo, baseado na minha experiência tanto como aluno de faculdade quanto no YouTube e por aqui, é impossível ensinar todas as pessoas sem conhecer as dificuldades de cada um (Richard Dawkins, Oxford, fala isso em um vídeo). Lembre-se que ofereço aulas particulares, algo mais personalizado para as necessidades de cada aluno. Geralmente, tenho procurado melhorar o curso valendo-me de feedback dos estudantes.

O que é MongoDB?

MongoDB é um banco de dados NoSQL (não relacional): não existem conceitos como tabela. Uma das grandes vantagens do MongoDB é oferecer a possibilidade de se salvar dados de forma heterogênea, focada em objetos JSON (JavaScript Object Notation); além de ser escalável horizontalmente (ou seja, é possível ter diferentes estruturas para se armazenar os dados no mesmo programa, é muito simples).

Apesar de que vamos falar de MongoDB, o foco deste curso é o Mongoose, não o MongoDB, existem muitos outros cursos por aqui focado somente no MongoDB!

Mongoose torna o processo de se trabalhar com o MongoDB ainda mais fácil! Mongoose, além de oferecer a comodidade de se programar em JavaScript/TypeScript de dentro da aplicação Express.js/NestJS, também oferece opções como métodos personalizados ou mesmo já prontos como parte do Mongoose, para se manipular os atributos, ou “paths” na linguagem do MongoDB. Para quem gosta de programação orientada à objetivos, é muito fácil e prazeroso pegar as manhas do Mongoose.

Sobre testes

Entropia mede a desordem de um sistema. De acordo com pesquisadores da área, testes garantem que seu software não vai aumentar a entropia ao aumentar de tamanho. Vamos falar de testes unitários, sem entrar em muitos detalhes por ser um assunto rico em se.


======================================================================================================================

Apesar de testes criar a necessidade de mais códigos, focar em testes desde o início pode ser uma boa estratégia, como argumenta pesquisadores da área.

Por que focar em testes(*):

• Facilita a adição de novas features quando sua plataforma crescer;

• Documenta os comportamentos esperados, conhecido como Behaviour Driven Development (BDD);

• Cria uma rede de segurança de que seu software não vai ficar com bugs ao ser atualizado e/ou melhorado;

• Garante que novos desenvolvedores do seu software não terão dificuldades em dar continuidade ao seu trabalho, até mesmo você caso volte alguns meses depois aos códigos; cada mudança terá um teste para automaticamente verificar se isso quebra o sistema como um tudo.

Assuntos correlacionados

Devido à correlação, os seguintes tópicos são discutidos, de forma adicional(**):

· Test Driven Development (TDD) – TDD é uma forma de se programar, onde se foca nos testes;

· NestJS – framework que promete melhorar o Express, focado em TypeScript;

· Express – biblioteca que oferece suporte ao Node.js;

· Testes de unidade (unit testing) – técnica usada para testar o menor pedaço de código possível;

· Mock – técnica usada para se testar códigos que dependem de outros códigos, alguns chamam isso de "escola de Londres", ou, "mockista";

· Jest – biblioteca em JavaScript usada para se colocar em prática conceitos como teste de unidade de mock.


======================================================================================================================


Ver anexos para amostras desses conceitos.


Este curso vem acompanhado dos seguintes recursos externos:

· GitBook - neste material online, coloco as argumentações do curso. Note que são recursos independentes, sendo assim, pode ficar fora de sintonia;

· Repositório GitHub - com o objetivo de facilitar a vida dos(as) estudantes, o mesmo pode começar de um código pré-pronto ou mesmo somente seguir;

· Slides;

· Vídeo gratuitos no YouTube - existem vídeos no meu canal do MEAN stack, stack que usa o MongoDB, além de vídeos sobre o Mongoose, usando como exemplo, o populate.

Este curso vem acompanhado dos seguintes recursos internos:

· Newsletter com atualizações do curso e artigos de tópicos relacionados, que chamo de aprendizado continuado, procure por no YouTube: “Como funciona o aprendizado continuado nos meus cursos da Udemy?”

· Atualizações dos vídeos, isso inclui novos materiais de tempos em tempos, sem precisar pagar mais por isso, faz parte do acesso vitalício;

· Aulas presenciais de brinde, de tempos em tempos vou organizar algumas aulas 1 a 1, ou mesmo em pequenos grupos;


Talvez seja do seu interesse: sou professor star na plataforma superprof, com revisão de alunos publicadas no perfil, se precisar de ajuda, dou um descontão para vocês que fizerem meu curso! Procure por JavaScript sem colocar a cidade, somente Brasil, geralmente apareço na primeira página de busca! :) Se procurar Angular 2, nesse momento sou o segundo professor.

Gostaria de conhecer meu trabalho? procure por IdeaCodingLab no YouTube!

Junta-se à essa comunidade cada vez maior de programadores JavaScript que usam o MEAN stack, em especial, o MongoDB!


==

Avaliação de alunos comentadas

Venho comentando as avaliações de alunos nosso blog.

Espero que ajude a entender como o curso foi feito, e possíveis futuros para o curso.

Lembre-se, cursos da Udemy estão "vivos": em geral, o professor atualiza constantemente.

==

(**) sendo assim, não recomendo comprar o curso somente por causa desses conceitos.

(*) ver Unit Testing Principles, Practices, and Patterns Book by Vladimir Khorikov
targetAudiences: Desenvolvedores web que queiram aprender a usar o Mongoose
Iniciante em programação NodeJS que queiram aprender a usar o Mongoose como forma de se comunicar com o MongoDB
Estudantes de APIs
Estudantes de NodeJS
Estudantes de NestJS

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un sitio web con WordPress, utilizando el constructor visual de Elementor, que llevarán el diseño de su sitio web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestra "Máster en Elementor, ¡Desde Cero Hasta Experto!", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 175,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y Elementor de forma rápida y sencilla.

courseDetails.title: Get Paid to Own Stocks: Work From Home & Get Paid
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to sell secured put options to generate income on a monthly or yearly basis with no prior knowledge of options
courseDetails.longDescription:
Learn one of the best kept secrets in the stock market. Taught by Joe Correa, who owned and managed an investment advisory firm and was series 65 licensed and has traded options for years. Selling cash secured puts is profitable and is one of the investment strategies with the highest probabilities of success in the stock market. You don't need prior knowledge of options to complete this course and can start making money right away.

If you want to start generating passive income on a monthly basis and have the drive to learn a new investment strategy, then this is the course for you. For people who are constantly looking for deals and want to own great stocks at a discount, this is your chance. By selling cash secured put options contracts you'll be able to have the opportunity to own stocks at a deep discount and if the stock doesn't go down enough for you to buy it, you get to keep the premium payments.

Imagine that. Getting paid to own a stocks and even getting it at a deep discount. When you sell cash covered puts, you have three ways to profit.

1. If the stock goes up, you make money.

2. If the stock moves sideways, you make money.

3. If the stock goes down but not enough for you to have to buy it, you make money.

If in the worst case scenario, the stock reaches the price you offered to buy it at, you will end up owning the stock but still get to keep the profits made by offering to buy it at that price. "So what's the catch" you ask? You'll have the same risk as owning stock but profit if it goes up, down, or sideways. Invest with very little money and make great returns. Even if you are ultra conservative and chose to make a low profit of 3% per month, this would be a 36% per year! Buying options can be a low probability trade but selling cash secured puts can be of much higher probability from 56% to a 98% chance of profit.

In this course, you'll learn:

- How to invest without paying any fees through Robinhood Financial and Webull

- How to get stocks for free by using my referral code.

- How to sell cash secured puts.

- Become an expert at finding great opportunities.

- Discover the "Best options selling plan", which you can copy and start making profits.

- How to practice selling cash secured puts through paper trading accounts.

- How to create passive income on a weekly or monthly basis.

- Automate your trades so you can enjoy the day while you wait for your position to be executed at the price you want.

- Increase your chances to profit by using probabilities to take advantage of trades.

- Limit your risk by choosing great stocks and offering to buy them much lower than they're currently trading at.

You can even start your trading account with no money at all by referring friends and family and getting free stock for doing so. You can sell that stock after that and keep the money or reinvest it to sell cash secured puts to generate monthly passive income.

In the first part of the course, I will go over what selling cash secured puts is and what the benefits are. You will also learn how to get your first free stock and start creating your investment portfolio. Besides that, you will learn how to calculate your maximum profit potential and what the risks are (which are the same as owning stock, but slightly less since you'll get paid anyway).

In the second part of this course, you'll the basics of what options are and why selling cash secured puts is such a profitable and high probability strategy. I will go over some live trades so that you can copy my strategies and my approach towards investing in the stock market. You will understand why options lose value over time which will increase your profits much faster as they get nearer to the expiration date.

Your instructor

Joseph Correa was the founder and CEO of Trust Investment Advisors, and was series 65 licensed. He owns and manages other financial and educational businesses that require savvy decision making and smart investment strategies. Having invested hundreds of thousands of dollars, he knows what investments are profitable and how to maximize their potential.

* This course does not cover options technical analysis.
